description:
1. Create simple savings product and activate for a client on 01 January 2016. 
2. Create account closing on 02 March 2016.
3. Click on post interest
> Interest is not getting posted, but no proper error message is displaying.

For screenshots refer the link:
name: Mifos X Web App - For Savings Accounts If Interest Posting Is Done Manually After Account Closure, No Proper Error Message Is Displayed
